locate_ancient_city.title: Find an Ancient City
locate_ancient_city.description: Ancinet Cities are underground cities found in the Deep Dark biome of the Overworld

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Fantastic, now make some noise to wake up the fallen.

defeat_the_warden.title: Defeat The Warden
defeat_the_warden.description: The ancient cities are home to the wrath of The Warden that is awaken by sounds.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Astonishing! Check the loot bag, you can get an arc from him that can turn you invisible! Remember, you could get a better one from the enemy

get_depth_key.title: Get a Depth Key
get_depth_key.description: For this you will need End Rods and what you have looted from the Warden

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Now See that massive rectangle? That`s the portal!

travel_to_depth.title: Travel to The Depth
travel_to_depth.description: Lit the portal with a Depth Key and jump inside.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome to the Depth. This realm is anything but friendly. You might need new gear to see better around.

83combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 83
83combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 83.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

86combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 86
86combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 86.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

90combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 90
90combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 90.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_depth_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_depth_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues. There is one more obscure place to visit.
